txt.en: 'There have been a rash of rancid pies all across the Shire.'
'Have you heard? Mayor Whitfoot's worried about some upstart from Hobbiton!'
'Why has this happened, you ask? Because the few privileged have hoarded the best fillings for their own!'
'What's she talking about?'
'It's true! The Brandybucks, the Tooks...these so called patriarchs have been keeping the common hobbit under their heels!'
'Hey, my cousins are Tooks!'
'The Thain? The Master of Brandy Hall? These are hollow titles handed down from straw-man to straw-man!
Ethuillos
'Straw-man? Is she saying the Thain's a scarecrow?'
Haerel
'I'm saying Mayor Whitfoot's the only hobbit we can trust because we are the ones who empower him!'
'You spilled everywhere, you daft cow!'
'Oh my, did we? He's a nice enough hobbit, but I'm not sure if I meant to, ummm, empower him.'
'I have never seen such a disaster! Such waste!'
'I've got to hand it to you, that is the biggest gourd I've ever seen!'
'Oh what a lovely gift! I'm so happy, I could dance!'
'It sure is!'
Bounder
'Even bigger than the one old man Holman grew years ago!'
'Oh those waggle-jaws at Town Hole think too much of themselves and their ideas. I could use a bitter, but I must get back.'
Bounder
Steed of Michel Delving
Farmer
Bounder
'Have you heard? Mayor Whitfoot's worried about some upstart from Hobbiton who's been secretly gathering support.'
'You don't say! Do you have any idea who it is?'
'That's the rub isn't it; no one knows! But loose tongues have been a-wagging, oh yes they have!'
